item.description:
It's time for another swap! Can you believe it'll be SPRING when we finish this one?? Just follow the directions below to prepare your entry. We'll draw names on February 17th and swap on March 31st.



Spruce-up your Home for Spring Swap

Please answer the following questions to help the giver knit the perfect item and to help them find ideas to figure out some extra goodies you may like to receive in your swap package. Just remember the cost of this swap is limited to $25.00.

Suggested item to be knit and swapped – cozies, pillow covers, table runners, lace, washcloths or hand towels, felted items… basically any item you can think of to knit or crochet for the home. Ravelry and Lion Brand are good resources for free patterns on the web. If you do not have access to the Inter-Webs ask a friend!


Either print this or on a piece paper write the following...


1. Your name, your Seacoast Knitters tag, and your Ravelry name & email if you have one.


2. What would you appreciate most; something for the kitchen, dining room, living room, or "surprise me."


3. Colors that clash with your color sense?


4. Colors you love.


5. Any fiber allergies or fiber you'd like to avoid?


6. Cat, dog, or other?


7. Favorite book or magazine (knitting or not)?


8. Favorite knit or crochet designer?


9. Favorite Easter or other candy?


10. Favorite Spring flower? Are you a gardener?


11. Favorite beverage?


12. Anything else that your swap partner should know about you?


Finally, place your answers in a plain legal size envelope. Draw a small identifying mark or your initials on the back of the envelope. This will help you to know whether or not you’ve pulled your own envelope. If someone else is going to draw a name for you, then email this information to them.

• Date to draw names 02/17/2011
• Exchange date 03/31/2011
item.name: Let's swap!
